member.summary: Gets a list of balance changes of specified user's account
member.param: The id of the account to get the balances for
Asset name
Blance change types
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Sorting order (Ascending by default)
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)
Cancellation token

member.summary: This endpoint returns the balance changes of specified user's account.
member.param: The id of the account to get the ledger for
Asset name
Blanace change types
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Sorting order (Ascending by default)
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter
Cancellation token

member.summary: The base address for the authenticated websocket

member.summary: The base address for the market by price websocket

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderBookOptions.MergeStep
member.summary: The way the entries are merged. 0 is no merge, 2 means to combine the entries on 2 decimal places

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderBookOptions.Levels
member.summary: The amount of entries to maintain. Either 5, 20 or 150. Level 5 and 20 are currently only supported for the following symbols: btcusdt, ethusdt, xrpusdt, eosusdt, ltcusdt, etcusdt, adausdt, dashusdt, bsvusdt.

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderBookOptions.SocketClient
member.summary: The client to use for the socket connection. When using the same client for multiple order books the connection can be shared.

member.summary: The name of the data channel
